page.title: 12New Mill Gala.
page.content: Much of village recreation is self-generated.The annual village gala is the culmination of great deal of effort throughout the previous year.The gala committee meet regularly to plan the day's events.On the evening before and the morning of the Gala a small army of volunteers prepare the site.The great day itself begins with a parade of decorated floats and people in fancy dress.This is led by Hepworth Brass Band.At the field the Gala Queen is crowned and the afternoon fun begins.There are displays to watch such as Majorettes and Steel Bands.A variety of side shows(roll-a-penny,bran tub,tombola etc.)provide amusement and raise funds for village groups.Refreshments are available to suit all tastes.A good day is had by all and talked about for weeks after.
